item.title: Barebones model of Spotify's 'Recently Played' screen using a Least Recently Used (LRU) cache in Golang
item.description: One of the most used caching schemes is Least Recently Used (LRU).

item.title: When and Why to use a Least Frequently Used (LFU) cache with an implementation in Golang
item.description: Over the years, people involved in computer science and engineering have worked really hard on optimisations of various natures.
